alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Harrison; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 8:35PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL HARRISON... SOUTHWESTERN CARROLL AND EAST CENTRAL TUSCARAWAS COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM EDT... At 835 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Uhrichsville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... New Philadelphia, Uhrichsville, Dennison, Midvale, Bowerston, Barnhill, Sherrodsville, Roswell, Leesville, Atwood Lake, and Leesville Lake Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
